name: Connected World
description:
DEV SQUAD GAME JAM 2021

This project was done under 3 days as soon as i saw the jam opening, i joined the jam to practice what i have learned in UE4 so far. The pressure to deliver a project in such short time has helped me learn alot. 

DISCRIPTION

Player moves from one world platform to another in other to reach the final goal to pick  a key for the final world.

CREDITS

  1. All assets and models are all property of Unreal Engine or Epic Games.
  2. Music from freesound.org.

CONTROLS

[W] move forward

[A] move left

[S] move back

[D] move right

[SPACEBAR] Jump

IN GAME CONTROLS

[E] To open the final door

PICK UPS

Coins

Gems

Please this is my first project due to time limits there are many functions that i wanted to add but could not do so. i hope to improve on that.

PLEASE! PLEASE! FOLLOW ME 

follow me here to get notification on new projects and devlogs
